articles.author: The Hacker News
articles.title: APT28 Uses Microsoft Office CVE-2026-21509 in Espionage-Focused Malware Attacks - The Hacker News
articles.description: APT28 exploited a Microsoft Office flaw to deliver MiniDoor and Covenant Grunt malware in targeted attacks across Ukraine and Eastern Europe.
articles.content: The Russia-linked state-sponsored threat actor known as APT28 (aka UAC-0001) has been attributed to attacks exploiting a newly disclosed security flaw in Microsoft Office as part of a campaign codena… [+4232 chars]
